Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: player and GM reference sheets

Add one-page reference sheets for convention RPG:
- player-rules.md: character creation, core mechanics, combat, spells
- gm-rules.md: monster rules, situational modifiers, running tips

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add index card character sheet template

Compact character sheet designed to fit on a 4x6 index card:
- Front: name, sentence, stats, hearts, spells, gear, coins
- Back: spell reference and quick roll chart

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add character creation wizard web app

Mobile-friendly wizard that walks players through character creation:
- Stats: roll 3d6, assign one at a time, triplicate detection
- Sentence: ancestry, background, talent, flaw \(BUT clause\)
- Spells: optional, pick 3 from 14 options
- Gear: starting equipment + coin roll

Features:
- LocalStorage save/load
- Print-friendly CSS for PDF export
- Vanilla JS, no build step \(GitHub Pages ready\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix duplicate character saves

When saving a character, check if one with the same name exists.
If so, prompt user to update existing or save as new copy.

- Add findByName\(\) and updateCharacter\(\) to Storage
- Update saveCharacter\(\) to check for duplicates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
